functions.name: addComposeHeader
functions.description: Adds given message header to current message.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: TabId to the tab with the message to add the message header to.

parameters.name: headerValue
parameters.description: Header value to the given header name to add.

functions.name: deleteComposeHeader
functions.description: Remove given message header from current message.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: TabId to the tab with the message to remove the message header from.

functions.name: hasComposeHeader
functions.description: Checks if given message header is present in current message.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: TabId to the tab with the message to check.

functions.name: getComposeHeader
functions.description: Remove given message header from current message.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: TabId to the tab with the message to remove the message header from.
